snippet.title: Asura Release Trailer - Steam , Humble Store & GOG
snippet.description:
Available On:
Steam:  http://store.steampowered.com/app/524640
Humble Store: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/asura
GOG: Coming soon!

Check out the Asura Rise Of The Demon King Cinematic at https://youtu.be/5WUmmwzNhpU 

Asura is an Indian Mythos inspired rogue-like game with Procedurally Generated Skill Tree developed by India based Indie game company, Ogre Head Studio.

You take on the role of a demon incarnate known as Asura and embark on a journey for vengeance and retribution. Hacking and slashing through the randomly generated fortress of the Daeva empire, You will encounter and unlock a variety of bosses, champions and enemies inspired by heroes of Indian mythology. Craft your demon using the ever changing skill tree and lay destruction on your foes by wielding unique Weapons and Armour but beware... on death, you will reincarnate and set forth all of over again from the very beginning.

http://www.asurathegame.com/

Check out the latest updates on:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/asurathegame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/asurathegame

The game is developed by Ogre Head Studio, a two man independent game company based in India who aspires to bring a much needed change in the Indian game industry by making amazing inspired by Indian settings and culture for the world to enjoy!
